import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import BookModel from "../../models/BookModel"; export const CheckoutAndReviewBox: React.FC<{book: BookModel | undefined, mobile: boolean, currentLoansCount: number, isAuthenticated: any, isCheckedOut: boolean}> = (props) => { return(

{props.currentLoansCount}/5 books checked out

}

); }
